String.string: Speak with Barlyas hiding behind the shop at the Cutthroat Harbor.
Kill Slawgesh and search for clues.
Kill gula brawlers on Mistmoor Island. Bring back their primer.
Meet Perina and collect Slawgesh's ledger.
Use the Gula Cipher and decode the Encrypted Ledger. [Press key to open inventory and use Gula Cipher.]
Bring the decrypted ledger to Perina.
Report to Barlyas in Cutthroat Harbor. [Press key to open inventory and use Cutthroat Harbor Teleport Scroll to return to Cutthroat Harbor.]
Speak with Barlyas at the Relic Hunter Outpost. [Use the {@LinkCreature:62#1027#Teleportal} to go to Relic Hunter Outpost.]
Find the teleportal in the west room on the second floor of Azarel's Labyrinth. [Speak with {@linkcreature:209#2000#Tulutulu} to go to Azarel's Labyrinth Depths.]
Use the teleportal to reach the hideout. Kill Kutmaschuk and collect the accursed lance.
Bring Gidd's Lance to Barlyas at the Relic Hunter Outpost.
